comment: Jake was a good professor. Sometimes questions were not clearly answered or dismissed, but as long as you put in the effort, ask him any questions you have (just to be safe), and attend class you will probably be fine. He answered my emails promptly and wanted us to do well but did not make exceptions or put up with low quality work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: My brother was killed while I was taking his class and he was no help whatsoever. I told him the circumstances and was continuously told he "can't" extend assignments that I missed any further. He is a harsh grader, that talks to his students like they're stupid. Avoid him if you can.
Jake is extremely dismissive of your questions and concerns in the class. Grades are ridiculously harsh and wants all your work to be absolutely perfect to get an A. Avoid if you can.
Jake is a very nice professor. However, he is such a harsh grader and does not take the time to completely explain all the criteria of each assignment which can cause points off. Try to avoid him.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader
